snippet.title: Lehman Blame Game Still Played Four Years, $12.8 Trillion Later
snippet.description:
Lehman Blame Game Still Played Four Years, $12.8 Trillion Later
By Philip van Doorn 07:29 AM EDT 09/15/12
Better Markets says that the 'Wall Street-caused financial crisis' has cost the U.S. economy $12.8 trillion.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/11702517/1/lehman-blame-game-still-played-four-years-128-trillion-later.html

snippet.title: Henry Paulson's 'On the Brink'
snippet.description:
Henry Paulson's 'On the Brink'
By Robert Teitelman 02:00 PM EST 03/04/10
